meanings.definition: Amautik: a type of Inuit parka with a pouch for carrying a child
meanings.sent1: The amautik kept the baby warm during the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed her baby in the amautik before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The amautik looked like a cozy nest for the little one.
meanings.sent4: Her love for her child was as protective as an amautik.
meanings.sent5: The colorful amautik stood out against the white snow.

meanings.definition: Amautik: relating to or characteristic of the Inuit parka with a pouch for carrying a child
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate design of the amautik parka.
meanings.sent2: The amautik style was popular among the Inuit community.
meanings.sent3: The amautik pattern reminded her of the beautiful Arctic landscape.
meanings.sent4: Her caring nature was as comforting as an amautik embrace.
meanings.sent5: The soft fur lining of the amautik felt luxurious against her skin.
